jobTitle: FLOWER DELIVERY UP TO $300.00/DAY FOR MOTHER'S DAY
jobDescription: FLOWER Delivery Drivers needed for this busy upcoming Mothers Day season. Drivers needed beginning Tuesday May 8th to Monday May 14.  This is a contracted 1099 position. You are paid per successful delivery. You use your own car, gas, and must have a smart phone to be routed and have recipient sign-on phone once delivery is received.  If you currently drive for Uber or Lyft, this is a great opportunity. Many of our drivers quit working for Uber and continue working for us as they use less miles and gas.  If interested, please bring your Driver's License and proof of insurance to our shop. We are looking to contract over 30 drivers.  Monday-Friday 7am-7pm  Saturday/Sunday 7am-8pm
